scripts.copiarGramatica: echo ========administrando Archivos Quetzal======== && npx rimraf dist/Gramatica/index.js && copyfiles index.js dist/Gramatica && npx rimraf index.js && echo ========finaliza administrador Quetzal========
scripts.correrGramatica: npm run gramatica && npm run copiarGramatica
scripts.buildWebpack: echo ===========Generando build con webpack ==========&& webpack --mode=development && echo ===========Build de Webpack finalizado==========
scripts.full-build: echo ========Full Build========  && npm run correrGramatica && npm run build && echo ========Finalizado========
